metadata.title: CVE-2017-11173 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Missing anchor in generated regex for rack-cors before 0.4.1 allows amalicious third-party site to perform CORS requests. If the configurationwere intended to allow only the trusted example.com domain name and not themalicious example.net domain name, then example.com.example.net (as well asexample.com-example.net) would be inadvertently allowed.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack-cors: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
